name: (FREE) VR Zoo Home Mixed Reality - Demo: Quest2/Pro
name_original: (FREE) VR Zoo Home Mixed Reality - Demo: Quest2/Pro
description:
FREE Demo = VR Oculus Quest2, MetaQuestPro

Create a Zoo in your home with 7 animals in this demo (full game has 60+)

full game itch link VR Zoo Home: Mixed Reality MetaQuest2/Pro by ZOSUStudios (itch.io)

- Demo animals include: elephant, stag, crocodile, great white shark, turtle, fish, hippo

- pass through enabled to see animals in your actual surroundings in mixed reality

- hand tracking enabled to allow hand placement of animals (controllers work as well)

- animals are placeable and moveable with deletion options in the demo (in the full game you can spawn animals)

Note that the full game has a variety of pre-made and customizable animal placements: full sized animals, half sized animals, tabletop sized animals

terms and conditions and privacy policy at www.zosustudio.com
